attributes.action: Hold a referendum in London on removing the role of Mayor of London
attributes.additional_details: We believe the role of Mayor of London is vested with too much power for one person, that this is not in the best interests of the people of London, and that a new assembly with a chairperson/spokesperson would better represent Londoners.
attributes.background: The Government should hold a referendum to remove the role of mayor of London and give these powers to a new London Assembly comprising of an elected representative from each London borough
